BlogBowl/BlogBowl

Open-source blogging platform with Notion-like editor

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Blog engine for Notion pages
  • Self-hosted blogging platform for writers using Markdown, supports multiple blogs, ActivityPub, minimal interface
  • Open-source collaborative wiki and documentation tool, alternative to Confluence and Notion
  • Self-hosted knowledge management in a single binary
  • CMS for blogs and newsletters
  • Generates blog articles from video or audio using Groq and Whisper
  • Static blogging template built with Astro, Tailwind, and shadcn/ui
  • JavaScript framework for building web text editors
  • Blogging engine without a database
  • Static blog writing client for Windows, macOS and Linux
